```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
nychvs2017 <- "../../data/input/NYCHVS 2017 Occupied File for ASA Challenge_CSV.csv"

codebook <- read_csv(nychvs2017)[1,] %>% 
            t() %>% 
            as.matrix() %>% 
            as_tibble(rownames = NA)

df <- read_csv(nychvs2017)[-1,] %>%
      mutate(stairs = case_when(UF1_12)) %>%
      # as_tibble() %>%
      select(borough, num_range("_f", 1:6))

```
